content: Hi! I noticed this event https://www.agoria.be/en/Belgian-eHealth-Plugathon-24-25-March-2020. Does anyone on this stream know any details?
I'm especially interested in details of Hands-on appointment scheduling using a HL7 FHIR API (advanced). Which system is used?
Hi. Yes, we are preparing this event

The HL7 FHIR API’s (intermediate) session will also be based on Scheduling resources, but at an entry level, using a simulator. This is meant as an [international focus] introduction to the advanced session you were talking about.
